about_the_game:
When Slaug [a space marine] strangely loses control of his Spacecraft and needs to crash-land on a Planet called Tellus he quickly becomes aware of some weird things happening in the area.



---

What game is 'Depths of Insanity'?

It's a first-person 3d exploration adventure with realtime melee & ranged battles against different abominations from a sinister lab that you meet around the game world.

The Game world itself is pretty opened up to explore in any way the player wishes to.

There are also a section where you build yourself a temporary home (which boosts your character because this adventure game also has minor RPG elements where the player can level up.

You will find key items to help you progress further on the main story.
There are however lots of places to get lost in when you explore (so the map of the game will surely come in handy).



- Cartoony 90s graphics
- Adventure with lots of exploration
- Housebuiilding & Furnishing
- Main Quest
- Side Quests
- Quest logs that you write yourself
- Mini Games
- Tons of Secrets
- Hidden music to collect and listen to in game
- Sci-fi elements
---

People are evacuating the town and a Sinister Lab is threatening the existence of the whole universe!



He now must do everything to make his Spacecraft space-worthy again to return home to his wife and beloved children on Planet Orizon!

In this First-Person 3D Adventure you will need to explore the area surrounding your crash site.
Collect all necessary materials to craft a temporary home and hopefully find a way to rebuild your Spacecraft and return home.

This game is filled with fun and crazy fun locations and characters!

(This is a demo and you will be able to venture in the forest, a dark cavern and some places around it).

Be sure to bring your courage when battling hordes of abominations to reach your goal.

content_descriptors.notes: This game contains blood, gore & Swear words.
